description: Main React application component for a note management system, handling user authentication, note loading, CRUD operations, and rendering the main UI layout including sidebar, note list, viewer/editor, and auth forms.

methods.name: saveUserToStorage
methods.description: Stores the user object in local storage for session persistence.

methods.name: loadUserFromStorage
methods.description: Loads the user object from local storage, or returns null if not available.

methods.name: clearUserInStorage
methods.description: Removes the user object from local storage.

methods.name: reloadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from API based on current user, category, and search criteria.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Handles user login process and updates state accordingly.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Handles user signup process and updates state accordingly.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clears storage, and resets notes state.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: handleUpdateNote
methods.description: Updates the selected note and reloads notes.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the selected note and reloads notes.
